text: This is the restaurant to visit if you enjoy delicious Heng Hua dishes at affordable price. Dishes started to be served shortly placing order. There are 2 options, air-conditioned and non air-conditioned.

Nice restaurant with good foods. It is only a bit cramped due to space fully packed. Very long queue. Need to reserve before disappointment. Parking is challenging, need to park at public car park. They have excellent customer service.

Love the fried bee hoon and prawn fritter. For the price point I think they served a really good hearty meal. Staff are down to earth and restaurant bring back you back to the 90s. Will revisit for sure.

Long establish resturant gives a nostalgic setting. Homely with appetising noodle and dishes. I always top my noodles with their vinegar
真好吃
Food standard seems to have dropped alittle, the bee hoon today actually tasted better than the lor mee. Their lor mee was the reason why we were there. One-star-less because of their subpar service.
